ygData.subject: Re: Re: Time for a new weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you don t mind my asking, just where the heck do you FIND seven HGs.  In the last four days, I ve seen exactly three, and one of them was dead.  I have
ygData.messageBody:
Jason Rochelle wrote:

> From: Jason Rochelle <Jasroc@...>
> ...
> Uldar Ulfangson
> 35th Bard, Rodcet Nife
> (who had a geat day with the HGs today, 7 kills, 4 back-to-back!, 200pp,
> in just 2 hours)

If you don't mind my asking, just where the heck do you FIND seven HGs. In the last four days, I've seen
exactly three, and one of them was dead. I have also seen zero Griffons. The new Gnolls are fully
camped, the Spectres have three groups sitting around the lake, Kithicor is (as I predicted) utterly
uncamped yet still a killer to move through half the time. Bah! I hate being level 35 on an aging and
crowded server.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 35 songs, Innoruuk (feeling a little cranky)
